Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm gave the Yankees the lead in the 10th
Anthony Volpe hit a hard grounder up the middle
Shohei Ohtani scored on a sacrifice fly by Mookie Betts
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first walk-off grand slam in World Series history
The game was tied at 2-2 after nine innings
Others: The Dodgers got a pair of sacrifice flies
The Yankees benefited from a two-run home run by Giancarlo Stanton
